::Zardus/Perndabot/DevilDuer/Reptilica/Bloodystrike::

Zardus lifts Iron Raptor as pieces of Icedemon's body fly past him, using her 
as a shield. Perndabot, DevilDuer, Reptilica, and Bloodystrike raise their 
arms, absorbing most of the shrapnel in their limbs.

Zardus smiles as the guardians retreat. The fools had actually thought that 
they could rescue these maximals! He turns around, noting that Perndabot was 
carrying Tavatron.

"Lets get back to base," Zardus says, Perndabot, DevilDuer, Reptilica, 
Bloodystrike, and himself setting off toward base. After several steps, 
Zardus turns around, looking at Dark One.

"Your pay is ready back at base."
